class_description: This interface represents an ad that has been served by the AppLovin server and should be displayed to the user.
method_description: Represents a unique ID for the current ad.

method_description: Get size of the ad to display.

class_description: This interface represents an ad that has been served by the AppLovin server and should be displayed to the user.

class_description:
This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user clicks on an ad.
 
 Since all AppLovin ads launch the device browser on click, this effectively notifies you that your app is about to be minimized to the background.
method_description: This method is invoked when the ad is clicked.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when an ad is shown or hidden to the user.
method_description: This method is invoked when an ad is displayed inside of the AppLovinAdView or AppLovinInterstitialAdDialog.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when an ad is shown or hidden to the user.
method_description: This method is invoked when an ad is displayed inside of the AppLovinAdView or AppLovinInterstitialAdDialog.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when the SDK loads, or fails to load, an ad over the network.
method_description: This method is called when a new ad has been received.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when the SDK loads, or fails to load, an ad over the network.
method_description: This method is called when an ad could not be retrieved from the server.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user watches a rewarded video, and the SDK has received a response from the AppLovin server either validating or rejecting their virtual currency reward.
method_description: This method will be invoked if the user selected "no" when asked if they want to view an ad.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user watches a rewarded video, and the SDK has received a response from the AppLovin server either validating or rejecting their virtual currency reward.
method_description: This method will be invoked if the user has already received the maximum allocated rewards for the day.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user watches a rewarded video, and the SDK has received a response from the AppLovin server either validating or rejecting their virtual currency reward.
method_description: This method will be invoked if the user's reward was detected as fraudulent and not awarded.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user watches a rewarded video, and the SDK has received a response from the AppLovin server either validating or rejecting their virtual currency reward.
method_description: If you are using reward validation for incentivized videos, this method will be invoked if we contacted AppLovin successfully.

class_description: This interface defines a listener intended to be notified when a user watches a rewarded video, and the SDK has received a response from the AppLovin server either validating or rejecting their virtual currency reward.
method_description: This method will be invoked if we were unable to contact AppLovin, therefore no ping will be heading to your server.

class_description:
This class is responsible for loading and displaying advertisements.
 
 An instance of this class can be obtained from an AppLovinSdk instance via getAdService().
method_description:
Deprecated. 
Listening to ad updates has been deprecated. The AppLovinAdView class for banners, leaderboards, and mrecs no longer automatically refresh contents by itself.
 You must explicitly call AppLovinAdView.loadNextAd() or AppLovinAdView.renderAd(AppLovinAd). This method will be removed in a future SDK version.

class_description: This interface defines a listener to ad video playback state. All registered listeners will be notified when a video ad changes to a relevant state. If a given ad is not a video ad, no video callbacks will be triggered.

class_description: This interface defines a listener to ad video playback state. All registered listeners will be notified when a video ad changes to a relevant state. If a given ad is not a video ad, no video callbacks will be triggered.
method:

                  double percentViewed,
                  boolean fullyWatched)
method_description: Triggered when a video stops playing in a video advertisement.

 Presenters for a few of the currently available ads include:

 2. FullscreenGraphicAdPresenter
 3. FullscreenWebAdPresenter

class_description:
Defines an AppLovin service which can be used to dispatch HTTP GET postbacks to arbitrary URLs.
 
 While we provide this service primarily as a convenience for native ad tracking URLs, you are welcome to use it for any postbacks you need to dispatch. Postbacks dispatched from this service happen in a asynchronous task.
method_description: Dispatch a postback to a given URL.
